InspirationNormal_Text.speaker: UI
InspirationNormal_Text.text:
During battle, allies will sometimes perform
a new tech that is related to the weapon
they currently have equipped.
This is called a 'glimmer'!

InspirationOriginal_Text.speaker: UI
InspirationOriginal_Text.text:
Humans will sometimes perform new
techs based on the one they just used.
This is called a 'custom tech'!

InspirationTrace_Text.speaker: UI
InspirationTrace_Text.text: Kugutsu will sometimes imitate the movements of others in battle, reproducing the tech they used and making it their own. This is called 'mimicking'!

OverAttack_Text.speaker: UI
OverAttack_Text.text:
Each tech has its own <emoji CoopRange01> combo range.
When these ranges meet on the timeline,
the attacks join together to great effect.
This is called a 'United Attack'!

OverDrive_Text.speaker: UI
OverDrive_Text.text:
When your retinue's combined efforts cause
your combo rate to reach a sufficient level,
they will sometimes unleash a combo that
pushes a United Attack to the limit.
This is called 'overdrive'!

SingleStage_Text.speaker: UI
SingleStage_Text.text:
When an ally has no one in the vicinity,
they can call upon their strength to unleash
a mighty sequence of solo attacks.
This is called a 'showstopper'!

Interrupt_Text.speaker: UI
Interrupt_Text.text:
Allies have the ability to react to
the affinity of an enemy tech and
preempt it with one of their own.
This is called an 'interrupt'!

Chase_Text.speaker: UI
Chase_Text.text:
By deciding on a target in advance,
allies can hit foes with surprise attacks
launched immediately after they act.
This is called a 'pursuit'!

Follow_Text.speaker: UI
Follow_Text.text:
Allies can rush to the aid of
whoever acted first and launch
an attack at the same target.
This is called a 'chain'!

Counter_Text.speaker: UI
Counter_Text.text:
When targeted by an enemy attack,
allies can nullify the assault and fire
back with a strike of their own.
This is called a 'counterattack'!

Protect_Text.speaker: UI
Protect_Text.text:
Allies have the ability to fend off
attacks, or even take attacks that
were meant for someone else.
This is called a 'protect'!

MonsterCapture_Text.speaker: UI
MonsterCapture_Text.text:
<emoji Weapon_Magu_big>Relic-bearers and monsters
can absorb fallen foes,
claiming their techs for themselves!
